header: This dataset gives patient reviews on specific drugs along with related conditions and a 10 star patient rating reflecting overall patient satisfaction. The data was obtained by crawling online pharmaceutical review sites. It has rows corresponding to idividual reviews, and columns corresponding to review ID, drug name reviewed, the condition the drug is taken to treat, the review text provided by the user, the user provided drug rating, the review date, and the number of times the review was deemed useful by other users.
